full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title
Advance Procurement Notice for Standing Offer for Survey Services at Greenwood, Nova Scotia

#### Project Summary

Defence Construction Canada - Atlantic Region (DCC-AR) is seeking a consultant to provide land surveying services at 14 Wing Greenwood and its satellite locations in Nova Scotia. The services include boundary and precision surveying, civil surveying, and other land surveying requirements.

#### Project Details

* Estimated contract value: $500,000 for the initial 3-year term
* The standing offer may be extended for an additional year or increased in value by $250,000, for a maximum value of $750,000 or 4 years, whichever occurs first
* The contract is expected to initiate in December 2023, subject to Department of National Defence (DND) approval

#### Anticipated Security Requirements

To be eligible for contract award, a consultant must hold valid and active security clearances at the time of closing. The required security clearance is the Designated Organization Screening (DOS) granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

#### Sponsorship Process

DCC-AR is providing early access to the security clearance application process through its Industrial Security Program (ISP). Consultants who do not hold the required security clearance can start the sponsorship request process by submitting an application through DCC-AR's website. The application must include the contract number GW23ST01 and the level of clearance requested.

#### Contact Information

For further information or questions regarding the sponsorship process, please contact:

* Gary Fulton, gary.fulton@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Telephone: 902-426-2526
* For questions related to this Advance Procurement Notice, please contact Donna MacDonald, donna.macdonald@dcc-cdc.gc.ca, 782-409-1845.

#### Disclaimer

DCC-AR does not provide assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or security clearance application will be successful or result in the granting of the requested security clearance. The processing of a sponsorship request package or security clearance application is subject to the terms and conditions of the sponsorship process and the security clearance granting process. By applying to these processes, the consultant accepts and agrees to bear any risks associated with the completeness or accuracy of their application and the timing of the security clearance granting process.

#### Tender Documents

This is not a bid solicitation. The tender documents are available on Merx.com. Fees may apply.
